PS: To avoid futures "sisters, mothers, even brothers  i want to mention this : 

LET IS NOT OUR HELPDESK , TIKETING , ETC ETC. If you have any problem you can contact us via tiketing system from your client area , will be fine also if you open a tiket and wait your turn because if you push in the tiket this will downd in the list so will be delayed. 

Also you can use our email : support(at)hostsolutions.ro

using all this ways and not get the answer in less than 24 hours feel free to send me here a private message (i tell this because in the past we had some problems with the tiketing support but now is resolved.)
